ComicInfo.Title: Without Justice, There Is No Peace!
ComicInfo.Summary: Without Justice, There Is No Peace!: Thor and Justice Peace try to save Jane Foster and the entire world of the future by stopping Zaniac. Volstagg adopts two orphaned boys.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:29:51. [Issue ID 41956]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Justice Peace,Kellen (criminal),Mayor of Brooklynopolis (flashback),Justice Mills (flashback),Zaniac,Thug Thatcher (ex-con)
